Data Management and Reproducible Science Claire S Teitelbaum 2025-08-13 1 Course overview This book contains lesson and exercises for FANR 5950/8950, Data Management and Reproducible Science, Fall 2025. Other course materials, including the syllabus, are available on eLC. 1.1 How to use this book Throughout this book, you will find text interspersed with R code. Though not required, it is recommended that you follow along by copying R code from this book into a script on your computer. The code will appear like the one in the box below, and you can copy it by hovering over the box and clicking the clipboard icon in the top-right corner: # This is some R code class_work <- "this" 1.2 Course schedule Below is the current schedule for this course.
